scripts.tsc: pnpm -C app tsc && pnpm -C packages/terminal-emulation tsc
scripts.test: pnpm -C app test && pnpm -C packages/terminal-emulation test
scripts.clean-node_modules: rimraf app/node_modules && rimraf node-pty/node_modules && rimraf packages/terminal-emulation/node_modules && rimraf packages/log/node_modules && rimraf packages/tsconfig/node_modules
